author: swagata87
body:
#### PR description:
This PR fixes 3 bugs in EgammaHLTGsfTrackVarProducer:
1) ValidHits was being filled by Chi2, and Chi2 was filled by ValidHits
2) ValidHits was always 0 because of a wrong logic 
3) Wrong logic while accessing chi2

#### PR validation:
runTheMatrix 
local tests

This PR is a not a backport.
title: Fix bugs in validHits and chi2
